testcase.name: TodoMVC - React When page is initially opened should focus on the todo input field
testcase.classname: should focus on the todo input field

testcase.name: TodoMVC - React No Todos should hide #main and #footer
TodoMVC - React New Todo should allow me to add todo items
testcase.classname: should allow me to add todo items

testcase.name: TodoMVC - React New Todo adds items

testcase.classname: should clear text input field when an item is added

testcase.name: TodoMVC - React New Todo should append new items to the bottom of the list
testcase.classname: should append new items to the bottom of the list

testcase.name: TodoMVC - React New Todo should trim text input
TodoMVC - React New Todo should show #main and #footer when items added
testcase.classname: should show #main and #footer when items added

testcase.name: TodoMVC - React Item should allow me to mark items as complete
testcase.classname: should allow me to mark items as complete

testcase.classname: should allow me to un-mark items as complete

testcase.name: TodoMVC - React Item should allow me to edit an item
testcase.classname: should allow me to edit an item

testcase.classname: should hide other controls when editing

TodoMVC - React Editing should trim entered text
